title: Development and Evaluation of AI-Based Higher Education Instructional Design Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Participants assume roles as corporate science education content developers and perform tasks under conditions similar to real work environments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically conduct a needs analysis for the 12th-grade media literacy module
Learners can critically analyze instructional design outcomes using an expert evaluation rubric
Learners can improve customized instructional design that reflects region/institution-specific elements using AI tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
